format: 5 run groups / 5 cars per run group / 20min sessions
description: Come join us as we kick off our 2022 track season at Hallett! Spring track days offer cool weather that both you and your car will enjoy. Our track events feature nearly two hours of track time for each participant, complimentary catered lunch, and free use of Hallett's covered RacePort paddock areas. Space is limited as usual, so be sure to contact us soon to sign up and guarantee your spot!

format: 5 run groups / 5 cars per run group / 20min sessions
description: Don't miss our last event of the season! September track days often produce some of the best driving conditions and fastest lap times, as the weather is cooling off and the track is more rubbered in. Our track events feature nearly two hours of track time for each participant, complimentary catered lunch, and free use of Hallett's covered RacePort paddock areas. Space is limited as usual, so be sure to contact us soon to sign up and guarantee your spot!
